entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
